title: Ep. 400: Conscious Consumption & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 400: Conscious Consumption & The Week’s Beauty News
description:
The production pace of the beauty and fashion industry is out of control, but what’s the solution? We talk about being more mindful with our fashion and beauty choices, and brands that encourage the same (see: KraveBeauty’s #SlowDownSkincare initiative). As journalists who report on a lot of these new products, we realize we’re part of the problem! But there’s room for nuance in this conversation, so let’s discuss. Also in this episode: Pat McGrath Labs Divine Skin Rose 001; Curlsmith’s acquisition (and the curly-hair soufflé everyone loves); Onda Beauty news; and the intriguing role a Milani concealer palette played in Johnny Depp’s defamation suit against Amber Heard.
